item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, January 5, 2025 at 2:50 AM UTC
item.description:

2. Combining 15s interval whole-sky-camera photos to form a 4y spanning keogram (364 points | 57 comments)

7. Self driving 1993 Volvo with open pilot (520 points | 117 comments)

10. Hacking yourself a satellite – recovering BEESAT-1 [video] (120 points | 5 comments)

21. The DIY Multideck (106 points | 41 comments)

23. Meta is killing off its AI-powered Instagram and Facebook profiles (283 points | 411 comments)
24. Infisical (YC W23) Is Hiring Solutions Engineers ( | hide)
25. Show HN: Pretty-print your chess games using Prettier (77 points | 8 comments)
26. No-hole surgery: no keyhole, yet surgeons can now still operate under your skin (5 points | discuss)
27. The Unisys Icon: One Canadian Xennial's Memories of Ontario's Obscure Computer (69 points | 26 comments)

29. How saffron became an American cash crop (74 points | 43 comments)
